description:
This market will resolve to the winner of the 2026 Ruffles NBA All-Star Celebrity Game MVP award.

If an unlisted player wins the 2026 Ruffles NBA All-Star Celebrity Game MVP award this market will resolve to "Other".

If two or more players are announced as winners of the 2026 Ruffles NBA All-Star Celebrity Game MVP award, this market will resolve to the player whose listed last name comes first alphabetically.

If the 2026 Ruffles NBA All-Star Celebrity Game is cancelled, the MVP award winner is not announced by March 1, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, or no participant is crowned as the MVP, then this market will resolve to “Other”.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the NBA; however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: 2026 NBA All-Star Celebrity Game: MVP

question: Will Shams Charania win the 2026 Celebrity All-Star Game MVP?
